name: Messy House (Japanese-style)
description:
Look forward to exploring six beautiful rooms with the goal of holding a complete set of items.


Simple operations!
· Tap after finding items
· Scale by pinching
· Move by dragging


Tips
· Tap small items after enlarging
· Clear leavels quickly to get three stars!
· Use hints when items seem impossible to find!
· Miss tapping carries a 5 seconds penalty!
· Are there items with the same name but differnet colors or shapes?


The game is entirely free.
The paid version extends "hinting" and "time extensions"
Children can safely play with the paid advertisement free version.


***** Works with iPhone5S+, iPad Air+ *****
